title: Epidemiological Alert: Misuse of GLP-1 receptor agonist medications and considerations for the Americas Region - 27 February 2026
desc: In recent months, there has been an increase in the number of countries reporting adverse effects of varying severity associated with the misuse of glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1) receptor agonists indicated for the treatment of obesity in adults.

title: Bolivian Military Plane Carrying Banknotes Crashes, 15 Dead
desc: A cargo plane carrying money crashed Friday near Bolivia's capital, damaging about a dozen vehicles on a highway, scattering bills on the ground and leaving at least 15 people dead and others injured, an official said.

title: Cargo plane carrying money crashes near Bolivia's capital, killing at least 15, official says
desc: A cargo plane carrying money crashed Friday near Bolivia’s capital, damaging about a dozen vehicles on a highway, scattering bills on the ground and leaving at least 15 people dead, an official said.

title: NASA announces overhaul of Artemis lunar program amid technical delays
desc: NASA on Friday abruptly said it was shaking up its Artemis lunar program that has suffered multiple delays in recent years, a bid to ensure Americans can return to the moon's surface by 2028.

title: Red alert issued for Vanuatu province as Cyclone Urmil passes nearby
desc: Tropical Cyclone Urmil formed southwest of Port Vila on Friday and was currently a Category 2 according to the Fiji Meteorological Service.

title: Islamic interbank activity hits Rs151b in Feb
desc: Rupee inches up to 279.47 against dollar as gold holds at Rs540,562/tola

title: Australian documentary Floodland uncovers human toll of 2022 Lismore floods
desc: Four years after floodwaters peaked at 14.4 metres in Lismore, a new documentary looks at how the town moved forward — and what more needs to be done.

title: Transforming farmers with practical goat farming
desc: Muhumuza challenged farmers to rethink what defines a good goat.

title: Esther McCarthy: What I learned at a midlife breakfast
desc: The event is called The Midlife Breakfast, organised by The Pink Ladies, to support breast cancer services at CUH so she’s preaching to the choir
